__e: (Chuckles) Guess you'll have to wait a little while longer for your sex slaves. (Laughs)
At times, they do expect sexual favors, but that is between myself and them, so I do not wish to further speak about that, if they do.
There came a time in our marriage when I had to buy her sexual favors with presents of one kind or another, usually jewels.
You can't go asking favours from an old friend
I tried to make it clear when I got here I don't want favors from anybody.
God willing, you won't need to take favours from anyone.
And it wasn't only on account of the thousand sweet things she done for me.
After all the favors I've done for you, you couldn't do one thing!
I want the truth, or all the goodwill that you've built with me, favors that you thought you were owed-- gone! Good-bye!
No, look at me.. should I recount all my favours on you?
Always handing' over her muffin to anyone with butter.
And if you've done him any favors... you've done the cause a huge big harm.
Well, don't. Okay? I don't need to be your good deed for the day.
I've had to do many things. I've had to do favors for many people.
He'll want favors. To get them, this is one of the things he'll have to do for you.
I've done you a million favors, and one time I ask you to do something...
And she's asked me for all kinds of favors, and I just didn't think it was too much to ask who he was.
You've all done me favors and now you're asking me to do something for you.
